german_shepherd.name: German Shepherd
german_shepherd.characteristics: Large, athletic build with a distinctive black and tan coat. Strong, muscular body with erect ears.
german_shepherd.temperament: Intelligent, loyal, confident, and highly trainable. Excellent working dog and family companion.
german_shepherd.care: Regular exercise needed, twice-daily walks and mental stimulation. Regular brushing for shedding.
german_shepherd.health: Monitor for hip dysplasia, elbow dysplasia, and degenerative myelopathy.

golden_retriever.name: Golden Retriever
golden_retriever.characteristics: Medium to large-sized with dense, water-repellent golden coat. Athletic and well-balanced.
golden_retriever.temperament: Friendly, intelligent, devoted, and patient. Great with children and other pets.
golden_retriever.care: Daily exercise required, regular grooming needed. Loves swimming and retrieving games.
golden_retriever.health: Watch for hip dysplasia, eye problems, and cardiac issues.

siberian_husky.name: Siberian Husky
siberian_husky.characteristics: Medium-sized with thick double coat. Beautiful facial masks and markings.
siberian_husky.temperament: Energetic, independent, friendly. Strong pack instinct and high prey drive.
siberian_husky.care: High exercise needs, regular brushing during shedding. Secure fencing essential.
siberian_husky.health: Monitor for eye problems, hip dysplasia, and skin conditions.

bulldog.name: Bulldog
bulldog.characteristics: Muscular, wrinkled face, pushed-in nose. Compact, broad, and powerful build.
bulldog.temperament: Docile, friendly, and willful. Great with families and children.
bulldog.care: Moderate exercise needs, regular face fold cleaning, keep cool in hot weather.
bulldog.health: Monitor breathing issues, hip problems, and skin fold infections.

beagle.name: Beagle
beagle.characteristics: Small to medium-sized with strong, compact body. Distinctive tri-colored coat.
beagle.temperament: Merry, friendly, and curious. Excellent with children and other dogs.
beagle.care: Regular exercise, secure fencing, consistent training approach.
beagle.health: Watch for obesity, ear infections, and hypothyroidism.

alaskan_husky.name: Alaskan Husky
alaskan_husky.characteristics: Athletic build with thick double coat. Strong endurance and working ability.
alaskan_husky.temperament: Energetic, friendly, and hardworking. Strong pack mentality.
alaskan_husky.care: High exercise needs, regular grooming during shedding seasons.
alaskan_husky.health: Monitor for eye problems, hip dysplasia, and exercise-related issues.

poodle.name: Poodle
poodle.characteristics: Elegant appearance with distinctive curly coat. Well-proportioned and proud.
poodle.temperament: Highly intelligent, active, and dignified. Excellent family companions.
poodle.care: Regular professional grooming, daily exercise, mental stimulation.
poodle.health: Watch for hip problems, eye issues, and skin conditions.

chihuahua.name: Chihuahua
chihuahua.characteristics: Tiny size with either short or long coat. Alert expression and saucy personality.
chihuahua.temperament: Confident, alert, and devoted to owners. Can be reserved with strangers.
chihuahua.care: Moderate exercise needs, dental care important, protect from cold.
chihuahua.health: Monitor for heart issues, dental problems, and patellar luxation.

persian.name: Persian
persian.characteristics: Long, luxurious coat, round face, short muzzle, and large eyes.
persian.temperament: Sweet, gentle, and quiet. Perfect for calm environments.
persian.care: Daily grooming, indoor lifestyle, regular face cleaning.
persian.health: Watch for respiratory issues, eye problems, and kidney disease.

siamese.name: Siamese
siamese.characteristics: Sleek build, distinctive color points, striking blue eyes.
siamese.temperament: Vocal, intelligent, social. Strong bonds with owners.
siamese.care: Light grooming, needs mental stimulation and play.
siamese.health: Monitor respiratory issues and dental health.

british_shorthair.name: British Shorthair
british_shorthair.characteristics: Round face, dense coat, sturdy build. Known for their 'teddy bear' look.
british_shorthair.temperament: Calm, patient, and easygoing. Good with children and other pets.
british_shorthair.health: Watch for hypertrophic cardiomyopathy and obesity.

maine_coon.name: Maine Coon
maine_coon.characteristics: Large size, long flowing coat, distinctive ruff around neck.
maine_coon.temperament: Gentle giants, friendly, good with families.
maine_coon.care: Regular grooming, large litter box, interactive play.
maine_coon.health: Monitor for hip dysplasia and heart conditions.

ragdoll.name: Ragdoll
ragdoll.characteristics: Large cat with semi-long coat, striking blue eyes.
ragdoll.temperament: Relaxed, affectionate, tends to go limp when held.
ragdoll.health: Watch for heart disease and urinary issues.

sphynx.name: Sphynx
sphynx.characteristics: Hairless breed with wrinkled skin, large ears.
sphynx.care: Weekly baths, protect from sun, keep warm.
sphynx.health: Monitor skin conditions and heart health.

american_shorthair.name: American Shorthair
american_shorthair.characteristics: Athletic, medium-sized with short, dense coat.
american_shorthair.health: Generally healthy, watch for heart disease.

burmese.name: Burmese
burmese.care: Minimal grooming, lots of interaction needed.
burmese.health: Monitor for cranial deformities and glaucoma.
